question:
In the misty moming, on the ... (1) of time    We've lost the ... (2) sun, a final sign
As the misty moming ....(3) away to die
Reaching for the stars, we...(4) the sky
We.... (5) across the air before we learned to fly
We thought that it ... (6) never end
We'd glide above the ground before we learned to run, run
Now it... (7) our world has come undone
Oh they ... (8) that it's over
(9) had to be
(10) children of the sea, oh
And it
We're ...​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

You....... an old table​

You have an old table.

Penjelasan:

Jawaban pada kalimat di atas dicetak tebal dan merupakan bentuk Simple Present Tense karena menjelaskan fakta. Jika subjek nya adalah kata You, maka harus memakai kata kerja Have yang artinya memiliki.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
EXERCISE FIVE    Give questions :-
?
1. Where
?
The two women lived in the same house.
2. How many
They each had a child.
?
3. What happened
It happened that one of the children died one night.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Where did the two women live?

2. How many child they have each?

3. What happened one night?

Penjelasan:

1. Kalimat dalam past tense, jadi pertanyaan menggunakan kata kerja did setelah kata tanya.

2. Menanyakan jumlah. Yang menjadi obyek dengan jumlah ditanyakan adalah 'a child'. Subyeknya adalah they yang merupakan kata ganti jamak, jadi kata kerja di pertanyaan menggunakan have.

3. Yang ditanyakan adalah apa, jadi peristiwa yang menjadi jawaban tidak disebutkan di pertanyaan.

related_questions.question: Because he is appointed te be the director of the cempang​

24. Della : "James, I need one hundred more bed    shield and pillow cases of any color. Can
you deliver them this week?”
James : "Sure but the price is increasing about
10%. Will you still make an order?”
Della : "If that's so, I have to tell this to my
boss. I'll give you a call after lunch."
What is the woman going to do?
A. Talk to her boss.
B. Cancel the order.
C. Buy the pillow.
D. Ask for a discount.
E. Look for another supplier.​
Kak minta tolong dijawab pertanyaan yg di atas​

answers.answer:
1. saving the planet

2. the earth is slowly dying because of us the humans

3. for everyone that wants to save the earth

4.?

5.about humans destroying the earth, and trying to save the earth

related_questions.question:
My House    I am Nisa. I live in Patokbeusi. My house is at no. 40 Jl. Raya Patokbeust. It's not big house
It's medium. It's painted grey. It has two floors. I like it anyway. It has a small garden and palm
and mango tree in front of the house. It has looks green and nice
My house has four bedrooms, two living rooms, a dining room, a kitchen and two
bathrooms. My bedroom is in the front part of the house, next to the living room. My parents' room
is in the middle part of the house next to the dining room. The kitchen and the bathroom are at the
back part of the house. I love house
very
much​
Taj mahal of india is...than candi prambanan of indonesia

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Taj mahal of india is bigger than candi prambanan of indonesia

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk komparatif dengan kata sifat (Adjective) satu suku kata sehingga untuk membentuk komparatif harus ditambahkan akhiran -er, menjadi is bigger than. Jawaban tidak mutlak is bigger than, tetapi bisa juga is smaller than atau kata lain yang dianggap lebih sesuai dan lebih valid berdasarkan data pengukuran matematis.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
27. Desi    "Do you mind if I use your pen to sign
this paper?"
"Just a moment. I haven't finished
writing my curriculum vitae."
Arif
What does the woman want?
A To borrow a pen.
B. To buy some paper,
C. To write an article.
D. To ask his paper,
E. To finish her writing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A

Penjelasan:

Artinya

Apakah kamu tidak keberatan kalau aku pinjam pulpen kamu buat tandatangani kertas ini?

Jawaban:

A.To borrow a pen

Penjelasan:

Desi ingin meminjam pena milik arif tapi,

Arif sedang menggunakan penanya untuk menyelesaikan tugasnya.

See you at the next answer

Pawuuu
